item.description:
Thursday's weather forecast is mostly sunny in the upper-70's and light breeze. I invite AA/A-level play on my net, optionally coed reverse. If three others tell me they want to start even earlier, I can do that.

I've seen as many as ten nets set up concurrently at The River, but I have no advance-knowledge or control over who else might set up nets or what they do with them. I do cap my net at 4 to 6 players total. Your best bet is to show up on time. The sun will set at 8:05.
item.how_to_find_us: On the grass between Soldiers Field Road and the Charles River
item.name: Grass Doubles at The River
